name: IT Developer - Analyst (back-office systems)
description:
Principal Responsibilities

The role is to run Business Analysis and Development streams to support and develop functionality in Diasoft that provides execution of BAU tasks as well as new product development requests. Within this role employee is responsible for taking ownership of tasks:

  • Use development tools to develop extensions to Diasoft system (accounting, settlements, messages, external connectivity, collateral, position management, reconciliation)
  • Understand internal clients’ needs, proactively offer best possible solution based on available systems functionality
  • Work in close relation with the business and support functions to design and propose most innovative solutions
  • Help business to understand existing system functions, to test existing and newly developed features and prepare configuration changes
  • Have up-to-date information on company’s IT systems and their features
  • Be involved in full development cycle, including system configuration, functional testing and end user acceptance
  • Provide support of day-to-day operations in Diasoft to internal clients.

Key Competencies & Qualifications

  • Strong SQL knowledge (MS SQL)
  • Preferable knowledge of Diasoft FA# v6-8 (Exchange trades, OTC trades, FOREX, OTC Options, Money market)
  • English: pre-intermediate / intermediate is a plus
  • Investment Banking products life cycle knowledge is a plus
  • Works well independently (of a supervisor) or in a small team
  • A degree in computer science or related field
  • Motivated and achievement oriented

Benefit package

  • Official employment
  • Competitive salary
  • Hybrid type of work
  • Professional training and development
  • Voluntary medical insurance for employee and their family members, life and health insurance
  • Sport and corporate events
  • Ability to build your career in the leading investment company.
